I have a problem with gamepad. The game runs smoothly, keyboard controls are working. In control options i set custom + override input device is set to gamepad. When i start game, gamepad controls doesn't work. Keyboard controls are fine.

Is there any solution?
Languajes?
Languaje?

@ulinsky, if you are using an PlayStation 3 or XBOX 360-controller, then you need to run motionjoy first, download, install, run, "click on driver manager", load driver(s), enter profiles, enable then you should be fine.
It seems if English (InglĂŠs/Anglais) is the only available option, which in my opinion is great! :)
Game runs in windowed mode . is there any way to change it to full screen ?
For fullscreen mode, click on the windows then ALT + ENTER.

Two major bugs so far:
- Audio glitches (co-driver/team)
- 3rd person camera view issues (image may be up-side down)
D_A7, while in windowed mode, make sure window is active (click on it to make sure) and press ALT+Enter. Should put it into full screen. Then change resolution in game options.
